public class PersistenceMemory
extends java.lang.Object

Maintains the memory of bundles.

public IBundle seeBundle(int visualValue)
Returns the first bundle found form a visual stimulation. TODO manage different bundles that have the same color. TODO manage different bundles with more than one visual stimulation. TODO manage bundles that have no tactile stimulation.
